data.qoute: Both faith and fear might sail into your harbour, but itâ€™s your harbour and you decide who gets to drop anchor.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Confidence is the hinge on the door to success.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Difficult roads often lead to...  beautiful destinations.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Do not allow anything to be an obstacle, see everything as a stepping stone to victory.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Do not wait for your ship to come in...  Swim out to it.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Don't be pushed by your problems...  Be led by your dreams.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute:
Don't carry mistakes around with you.
 Instead, lay them on the ground and use them as stepping stones so you can rise above them.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute:
Don't worry... Just breathe...
If it's meant to be, it will find a way.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Every positive thought propels you in the right direction.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Failure is the mother of success.
data.author: Unknown
